short_summary: Request for Information and Expression of Interest
description: This RFI/EOI process represents an opportunity to learn in greater detail about the capabilities of different firms available in today's market regarding the delivery of ITSP services for the Entity. This may include the provision and support of licensing for foundational IT tools, including productivity, security, infrastructure, network, and enterprise applications. \\. The results of this RFI/EOI process may support the development of CMHC's requirements through a potential subsequent Request for Proposal (RFP) process based on identified needs and/or gaps and shall better inform CMHC on potential contracting structures, such as selecting one (1) provider for all services (in-house vs. subcontracting). No contract(s) will be awarded from this RFI/EOI process.\u00a0
full_summary:
# Request for Information and Expression of Interest for Information Technology Service Provider (ITSP)

## Project Overview

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is issuing a Request for Information and Expression of Interest (RFI/EOI) to identify potential Information Technology Service Providers (ITSP) for the provision of IT services.

## Key Dates

* **Publication Date**: November 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 16, 2024, at 11:00 AM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 2, 2025
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2030

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Not Applicable
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Service Requirements

CMHC is seeking ITSPs to provide services including but not limited to:

* Information technology consultation services
* Information technology IT management services
* Computer software licensing service
* Information Technology Service Delivery

## Submissions

To participate, interested ITSPs should:

* Review the RFI/EOI document, available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52206/rfi-003070-itsp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52206/rfi-003070-itsp_en.pdf) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52206/rfi-003070-itsp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52206/rfi-003070-itsp_fr.pdf)
* Submit an expression of interest to Daniela Michaud, Contracting Officer, via email at dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca

## Contact Information

* Daniela Michaud
* Contracting Officer, CMHC
* Phone: (613) 740-4203
* Email: dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
* Address: 700 Montréal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0P7

## Disclaimer

This RFI/EOI process is an informal process and does not constitute a request for proposal. No contract
